title: Beracah, Valley of
content:
BERACAH, Valley of

The place where King Jehoshaphat brought the people of Judah to praise God (2 Chronicles 20:26). The people were grateful for God’s help in defeating the attacking armies of Moab, Ammon, and Mount Seir (2 Chronicles 20:1–25). The valley is probably the area Wadi el ’Arrub, not far from Tekoa, near a ruin called Bereikut.
